ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We possess strength and we possess great force. But the matter is in your hands so consider what you command.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "We are men of valour, and brave fighters. It is for you to decide. So consider what you should command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "We are strong and are given to vehement fighting. But the decision is yours. Therefore, consider what you would like to command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "We have great power and valor. You are the commander, so decide as you like".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We possess great strength and are great warriors, and the decision is yours, therefore consider what you will command.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We have great strength, and great ability for war, but it is for you to command; so think over what you will command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We are possessors of strength and possessors of mighty prowess, and the command is yours, therefore see what you will command.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We possess force and we possess great might. The affair rests with thee; so consider what thou wilt command.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We are lords of might and lords of great prowess, but it is for thee to command; so consider what thou wilt command.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "We are strong and our prowess in battle is great, but the decision is in your hands, so consider what you will command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we are owners of power and owners of great violence, but the command is with thee; see then whatsoever thou shalt command.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We are powerful and possess a great might. But it is up to you to command. So consider what orders you will give.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "We are endued with strength, and given to vehement war: but the command is with thee; so consider what thou wilt command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We have great strength, and great ability for war, but it is for you to command; so think over what you will command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We are possessors of force and great might. It is for you to command, so consider what you will'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We are a people of might and great courage, but the decision is yours, so consider what you wish to command.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:33] They said, ‘We possess force and we possess great might, in other words, we are hardy in war. The matter is for you [to decide]. So see what you will command’, us, and we will obey you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We are lords of might) we have weapons (and lords of great prowess) in war, (but it is for thee to command) we shall follow your command; (so consider what thou wilt command) and we will do it.
